description:
It is always nice to have options. This pocket-sized mini pump has a built in Co2 inflator, letting you choose how you get your tire back into rolling shape. For those rides where you’re not sure where you’ll go, this little pump is an easy way to bring along a little peace of mind.

  • Dual chamber telescopic design maximizes volume for easy inflation up to 100 psi (6.9 bar)
  • Aluminum construction with an ergonomic CNC-machined surface for added comfort
  • Dual head, one for Presta valves and the other for Co2
  • One 16g Co2 cartridge included
name: Cannondale Co2 Road Mini Pump
